name: ForceBook - A Powerful Custom-Built Laptop
description: We designed and built a notebook PC from the ground up, aiming for use by developers and gamers. Prioritizing customizability, we utilized desktop components and intentionally omitted the battery, opting for a power connection to achieve a compact form. Additionally, we devised and implemented a new interface using a touch display as a trackpad, focusing on ease of use.
